item.description:
Join the NBMAA from 5:30-8 p.m. Friday, Jan. 2, 2009 for First Friday featuring the Ben Billelio Trio, a classic jazz ensemble of piano, bass, and drums. Ben has forged a career as a noted performer and as a much sought after private instructor. As one of the most in demand freelance jazz drummers in New England, Ben can be seen at numerous clubs, concert halls and festivals with a wide variety of artists. At this time, Ben can be seen performing with his own trio, with Dezron Douglas on bass and Roy Dunlop on piano.

First Friday features live jazz music performed by local and nationally-known musicians, an opportunity to view the Museum's premier permanent collection of 300 years of American art, gallery talks, art activities, a chance to mix and mingle with other art and jazz lovers, a selection of light hors d'oeuvres, wine, beer and soda. The cost is $5 for Museum members and $10 for non-members, $3 for beer and wine, soda is free.

It is so hard to find people here some times plan to com and have a good time and if we connect then great. If not enjoy the music and the Art.
